item.title: HOOKER FURNITURE CORP 10-K
item.description: HOOKER FURNITURE CORP, which is in the Household Furniture [2510] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 16, 2021 had 26539 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2021 - 265 instances fiscal - 226 instances sales - 212 instances financial - 210 instances net - 194 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
